experiencesData.title: Mathematics Private Tutor
experiencesData.description: Provided useful lessons that emphasize practicality and real-life application. I used a variety of teaching methods depending on the student's needs and learning style.

experiencesData.title: Lifeguard
experiencesData.description: Always guaranteed surveillance, security and prevention. I also provided first aid when needed and intervened in different situations of risk with total success.

projectsData.title: Music Player App
projectsData.description: Spotify Clone coded in Kotlin and developed in Android Studio, fetches the songs from a Firebase database and provides the feature of adjusting the device volume with the user speed (GPS).

projectsData.title: Robot with Obstacle Detection
projectsData.description: Autonomous Vehicle Project developed in C, shows the acquired knowledge in several peripherals controlled by the microcontroller NUCLEO-L152RE Board.
